text: Castles are declared historic monuments by the Romanian Culture Ministry. This is a list of castles in Romania. Mureș County has the most castles per county, 28\. ==Major castles== {| class="wikitable sortable" border="1" |- ! Image !! Name !! Location !! Construction started !!
